title: 2016 Worlds Icons
body: After unlocking the C9 worlds platinum icon every time I'm in-game when I have the platinum icon equipped the back animation is there but when I press control 6 it comes up with the silver icon mastery not the platinum one. Why is this? Please help{{item:3070}}

replies.body: ive bought 14 jewels why cant i use them on my worlds icon? also when ive tryed 2 ask questions about why i cant forge jewel 2 icon the riot thing says i need 2 login which i did 11 times as it keeps going back 2 the login thing each time so i came 2 this forum 2 see if u guys can fix it,thankyou for your consideration and i hope you  champs can remedy this for me
